[i]Bestow Falchion[/i] – When Nagi, Dragon Avatar enters, create the Exalted Falchion and attach it to her or target commander you control.
[i]Divinestone[/i] – Whenever a creature you control transforms, create a copy of that creature, except the copy is a 6/6 Dragon Spirit in addition to its other types and isn't legendary.
